chart.title: Average carbon intensity of new passenger vehicles
chart.subtitle: Carbon intensity of newly registered passenger vehicles is measured in grams of carbon dioxide emitted per kilometer driven (grams CO₂ per km).
chart.citation: International Council on Clean Transport (ICCT) and European Environment Agency
